title: Bug 14943: Code Assist does not respect platform line ends
description: The Code Assist feature is not respecting the platform line ends.
OB: It is expected that the Code Assist feature respects the platform line ends.
EB: Currently, the Code Assist feature is not respecting the platform line ends. Instead of using CR/LF line ends, it is using a different format.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Create a new class.
2. Add a method to the class.
3. Define a local variable for an array within the method.
4. Observe that the Code Assist feature does not respect the platform line ends.
